item.title: Litter junction of Limes Rd & Clarendon Rise, 25th June
item.description:
Household litter spread across the pavement. Nappies food broken glass etc. First reported 5 days ago. The clean up van took the mess from C. Rise but did not see the mess in L. Grove. If the photo doesn't download Please contact 0880 966 534

item.title: Fly-tipping, 25th June
item.description:
There is a large amount of rubbish dumped on the parking spaces at the corner of Charlesfield and Lambscroft Avenue. This includes broken drawers, a wardrobe, and various other waste items. The parking space directly opposite house number 24 Lambscroft Avenue is completely full of rubbish and urgently needs to be cleared. Please can this be addressed as soon as possible?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lambscroft Avenue, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic equipment covered by foliage, 25th June
item.description:
TEL: 13/06/2025 09:38:18 - 13/06/2025 10:16:01 Krzysztof Moleda On arrival, I found active sd6 in the log. I checked the operation and found det working and replying correctly on utc atc GM. Fault could happen due to foliage blocking a clear view of rp1. Please see the attached pictures. Could we refer the site to the Bromley Council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmoreland Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large branch laying in road, 25th June
item.description:
A big branch has snapped off a tree growing in the grounds of Harris Primary Academy and is laying in the road, causing a potential obstruction to parking/traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crack uneven and broken paving slabs, 25th June
item.description:
From the school down to the entrance to Hollyoak Wood Park is dangerous with broken paving slabs all the way down, my daughter on various occassion has fallen off her scooter because uneven, broken pavements. The tree roots also cause issues with raised parts. Over a year ago, the broken slabs were marked up with a cross as i thought they were going to be repaired but nothing happened. This is outside my house so is hard to avoid and is a busy road with children travelling to school. Please can you take action ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 180, Days Lane, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: St Louis Road SE27 house number 19 at, 25th June
item.description:
St Louis Road SE27 house number 19 at the side of house number 19 St Louis Road ie actually in St Gothard Road white plastic electric meter box graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/place/133+Gipsy+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE27+9QT/@51.4281181,-0.0935964,3a,75y,250.56h,51.32t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sAsMnCZc4WYiBlK1G9B5pRQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D38.67585551838451%26panoid%3DAsMnCZc4WYiBlK1G9B5pRQ%26yaw%3D250.55707478262775!7i16384!8i8192!4m16!1m9!3m8!1s0x48760154c2a095a7:0xbebff11739af43ec!2s133+Gipsy+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE27+9QT!3b1!8m2!3d51.4275692!4d-0.0921853!10e5!16s%2Fg%2F11c4k_d03r!3m5!1s0x48760154c2a095a7:0xbebff11739af43ec!8m2!3d51.4275692!4d-0.0921853!16s%2Fg%2F11c4k_d03r?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYyMi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
